import axios from"axios";var url="http://localhost:5000";//Add api
var addTaskApi=function addTaskApi(formData){try{var res=axios.post(url+"/addTask",formData);return res;}catch(e){console.log(e);}};//update api
var updateTaskApi=function updateTaskApi(id,formData){try{var res=axios.patch(url+"/addTask/".concat(id),formData);return res;}catch(e){console.log(e);}};//Delete api
var deleteTaskApi=function deleteTaskApi(id){try{var res=axios.delete(url+"/".concat(id));return res;}catch(e){console.log(e);}};export{addTaskApi,updateTaskApi,deleteTaskApi};
